events.message: I have just filed a claim due to a car accident that occurred last night involving severe front-end damage to my vehicle.
The insurance team has categorised the recently filed claim under the auto accident category as per the details provided.
An agent has been assigned to handle your car accident claim and will be contacting you shortly for further information.
We acknowledge receipt of your claim regarding the vehicle collision and assure you that we will proceed with the investigation promptly.
Please submit the police report, photos of the damaged car, and vehicle registration documents to continue with the claim process.
All requested documents including photos of the damaged vehicle and the collision police report have been submitted successfully.
Our claims department has begun the investigation into your auto accident to assess the damages and validity of the claim.
The investigation is complete, confirming the extent of damage to your vehicle resulting from the road collision incident.
A settlement amount has been proposed based on repair estimates and policy coverage for your damaged vehicle.
The customer expressed concerns regarding the proposed settlement, requesting a reassessment of repair costs.
Due to the customer's request for reassessment, the claim has been escalated to the senior claims adjuster for further review.
Following the reassessment, your claim has been approved with an updated settlement amount matching the repair costs.
Insurance payment has been issued and should be credited to your bank account within three business days.
Your auto accident claim case has been closed following successful settlement and payment issuance.
